name: A Man Rides a Horse
description:
Name your horse.

Look to the stars

Travel the desert.

Make bad choices.

Die.

CONTROLS

click on horse to name it.

Click on rock to eat.

Click on arrow to look to the stars

Click on constellations to change your fate.

Click on choices to maybe not die.

Click on everything and nothing will happen.

Made for mystical western game jam.
